Rulings.Edison:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.
● If one target leaves the field before this resolves, the other is still destroyed.
● This effect must target exactly 2 cards. It can't target only 1 card.
Rulings.Tengu:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.
● If one target leaves the field before this resolves, the other is still destroyed.
● This effect must target exactly 2 cards. It cannot target only 1 card.

Rulings.Cat:
● Removing 1 Thunder from play is a cost to activate this effect.
● 'Batteryman Industrial Strength's' effect can't be activated unless there is at least 1 monster and at least 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field. 
● If an effect is chained that removes one of the targets from the field, the remaining target is destroyed.

Rulings.Base: 1. Removing 1 Thunder-Type monster from play is a cost to activate this effect.\n2. The effect of "Batteryman Industrial Strength" cannot be activated unless there is at least 1 monster and at least 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.\n3. If an effect is chained that removes one of the targets from the field, the remaining target is destroyed.

PSCT.Edison:
© Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Batteryman" monsters from your GY.
① Once per turn: You can banish 1 Thunder from your GY, then target 1 monster and 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy them.
PSCT.Tengu:
© Can't be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Batteryman" monsters from your GY.
① Once per turn: You can banish 1 Thunder from your GY, then target 1 monster and 1 Spell/Trap on the field;
destroy them.

PSCT.Base: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play 2 "Batteryman" monsters from your Graveyard. Once per turn, you can remove from play 1 Thunder-Type monster from your Graveyard to destroy 1 monster and 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.
